perturbation.original_text: 12.1 Any disputes between the Parties arising from the performance of this Agreement shall be resolved through amicable negotiations; in case such negotiations fail, both Parties agree to submit the dispute to the competent court where Party A is domiciled.

perturbation.explanation: Moving the dispute resolution clause to section 1.4, which discusses the business relationship and changes that can be made, will reduce its visibility and enforceability. The dispute resolution clause should be distinct, and not hidden among unrelated business aspects.
